directions.step:
1. Heat the honey untill it is liquid, best in microwave. 2. Fill the alcohol in a bottle and heat in water until it is about the same temperature as the honey. 3. Carefully add honey to the alcohol in the bottle,close well and shake good to mix. 4. Cool and let stand 2 weeks in cool place, test better the older it is.
Out of "1 X 1 Der guten Kueche"
